name: Tomb Chaser
description:
Tomb Chaser is a game about the duality of life and death. In this game, one player plays as a human night while the other player plays as a ghost. The Human must complete the level while the ghost must stop them by spawning monsters to stop the player.

The player one controls (Human) are WASD to move the spacebar to jump and the left mouse to attack.

The player's two controls(Ghost) are WASD to move and the numbers 1 2 and 3 to spawn three types of monsters.

If the human dies 3 times the ghost will win. 

If the human makes it to the end the human will win.

in order, the play one player must create a game with a password and the other player must join with the same password 

The player that creates will be the human while the person who joins will be the ghost.
